100.title: Geolocation Retrival Composite API
100.description: This system retrives the geolocation of the responder's IP by using composite APIs and connects to the typical way of microservices.

102.title: Ranking & Moderation System
102.description: This works on Discord.js, node.js, noblox.js, MonogoDB Atlas and webscrapping to get, edit or change a player's data in a community across applications.

110.title: Minimalistic Login Page
110.description: An ultra minimal user interface for login page. (Recreated using react.js)

00.title: Server Region Locator Tool
00.description:
This system retrives the location of the server using it's IP of the responser in JSON format

Simplified by parameter based oAuth.

02.title: Cross-server Matchmaking
02.description: This system creates a system where players from across many servers can join a Queue/Stack match and can be connected across many servers in real-time.

04.title: Hotel Room Alotter Framework
04.description: This system uses Remote Events and WS like connection to have a hotel alloter system across many players and server to enchance concurrency and UX.

06.title: Getting Assets of User
06.description: This system uses backend serverless APIs to get a user's assets by bypassing default security and retriving the assets of a player.

08.title: Discord-Roblox-Discord Bot
08.description: This bot connects via API and acts like a bridge to access and send message across different applications from the game.
